briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of ADS-5102 in PD Patients With Levodopa-Induced Dyskinesia

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in the Unified Dyskinesia Rating Scale (UDysRS) Total Score
outcomeMeasures.description: The UDysRS is a dyskinesia rating scale from 0-104; it evaluates involuntary movements associated with PD. A higher score indicates more severe PD. The UDysRS was measured at Baseline and Weeks 2, 4, 8, and 12.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in the Standardized PD Home Diary (ON Time Without Dyskinesia, ON Time With Troublesome Dyskinesia, OFF Time)
outcomeMeasures.description: A PD home diary was used to score 5 different conditions in 30-minute intervals: ASLEEP, OFF, ON (ie, had adequate control of PD symptoms) without dyskinesia, ON with non-troublesome dyskinesia, and ON with troublesome dyskinesia. The results were based on 2 consecutive 24-hour diaries taken prior to the day of randomization and prior to the Week 2, 4, 8, and 12 visits.
